description:
Tsukumo is a scientist employed by Easter. He starts out as Yukari`s subordinate and takes over Nikaido`s research. He is a bit of a scatterbrain and has strong feelings for Yukari.
When Yukari leaves Easter, Tsukumo inherits her research, as well as two additional subordinates, Chichimaru and Manda. Together these three come up with various plans and machines to catch the embryo, many of which end up in disaster.
name: Tsukumo
